mapper.select: select a.no as no, a.profile as profile, a.name as name, a.age as age, a.gender as gender, c.name as grade, a.email as email, a.phone as phone, e.name as departments from employees a, grade_emp b, grade c, dept_emp d, departments e where a.no = b.emp_no and c.no = b.grade_no and a.no = d.emp_no and e.no = d.departments_no and b.to_date = '9999-01-01' and d.to_date = '9999-01-01' and d.departments_no = ${value};

choose.when: insert into salaries values(null, #{no}, (select hire_date from employees where no = #{no}), (select age from employees where no = #{no}) * 100, '9999-01-01' );

when.test: name == null and age == null and gender != null

choose.when: insert into grade_emp values(null, (SELECT CASE WHEN age >= 60 THEN 8 WHEN age >= 55 THEN 7 WHEN age >= 50 THEN 6 WHEN age >= 45 THEN 5 WHEN age >= 40 THEN 4 WHEN age >= 35 THEN 3 WHEN age >= 30 THEN 2 ELSE 1 END FROM (SELECT age FROM employees WHERE no = #{no}) a ), #{no}, (select hire_date from employees where no = #{no}), '9999-01-01')

when.test: name == null and age == null and gender == null and phone != null

choose.when: insert into dept_emp values(null, #{departmentsNo}, #{no}, (select hire_date from employees where no = #{no}), '9999-01-01')

when.test: name == null and age == null and gender == null and phone == null

choose.when: insert into dept_manager values(null, #{no}, #{departmentsNo}, (select hire_date from employees where no = #{no}), '9999-01-01');
